title: Ask an Asparagus Grower: what's an important part of farm life| Produce Made Simple

tasks.task: Ensuring the safety of farm workers.
subtasks: Identifying potential hazards on the farm.
Implementing safety measures to prevent accidents.
Conducting safety training for employees.

tasks.task: Managing a large family on the farm.
subtasks: Coordinating living arrangements for a growing family.
Allocating resources such as rain boots to family members.
Scheduling medical appointments for family members.
Ensuring overall health and well-being of the farm family.

tasks.task: Overseeing farm operations during the growing season.
subtasks: Coordinating activities for a family expanding from five to over eighty members.
Maintaining a harmonious working environment among a large group.
Addressing the diverse needs and expectations of family members involved in farming.
